                              <div class="line">Whose eyes are on this sovereign lady fix'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">One do I personate of Lord Timon's frame,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom Fortune with her ivory hand wafts to her;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose present grace to present slaves and servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Translates his rivals.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis conceived to scope.</div>
                              <div class="line">This throne, this Fortune, and this hill, methinks,</div>
                              <div class="line">With one man beckon'd from the rest below,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bowing his head against the sleepy mount</div>
                              <div class="line">To climb his happiness, would be well express'd</div>
                              <div class="line">In our condition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, sir, but hear me on.</div>
                              <div class="line">All those which were his fellows but of late,</div>
                              <div class="line">Some better than his value, on the moment</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow his strides, his lobbies fill with tendance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rain sacrificial whisperings in his ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make sacred even his stirrup, and through him</div>
                              <div class="line">Drink the free air.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, what of these?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">When Fortune in her shift and change of mood</div>
                              <div class="line">Spurns down her late beloved, all his dependants</div>
                              <div class="line">Which labour'd after him to the mountain's top</div>
                              <div class="line">Even on their knees and hands, let him slip down,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not one accompanying his declining foot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis common:</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand moral paintings I can show</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall demonstrate these quick blows of Fortune's</div>
                              <div class="line">More pregnantly than words. Yet you do well</div>
                              <div class="line">To show Lord Timon that mean eyes have seen</div>
                              <div class="line">The foot above the head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpets sound. Enter TIMON, addressing himself
courteously to every suitor; a Messenger from
VENTIDIUS talking with him; LUCILIUS and other
servants following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Imprison'd is he, say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord: five talents is his debt,</div>
                              <div class="line">His means most short, his creditors most strait:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your honourable letter he desires</div>
                              <div class="line">To those have shut him up; which failing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Periods his comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble Ventidius! Well;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not of that feather to shake off</div>
                              <div class="line">My friend when he must need me. I do know him</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman that well deserves a help:</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he shall have: I'll pay the debt,</div>
                              <div class="line">and free him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lordship ever binds him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to him: I will send his ransom;</div>
                              <div class="line">And being enfranchised, bid him come to me.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not enough to help the feeble up,</div>
                              <div class="line">But to support him after. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">All happiness to your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter an old Athenian</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Timon, hear me speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Freely, good father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast a servant named Lucilius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I have so: what of him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Most noble Timon, call the man before thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Attends he here, or no? Lucilius!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCILIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, at your lordship's service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">This fellow here, Lord Timon, this thy creature,</div>
                              <div class="line">By night frequents my house. I am a man</div>
                              <div class="line">That from my first have been inclined to thrift;</div>
                              <div class="line">And my estate deserves an heir more raised</div>
                              <div class="line">Than one which holds a trencher.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; what further?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">One only daughter have I, no kin else,</div>
                              <div class="line">On whom I may confer what I have got:</div>
                              <div class="line">The maid is fair, o' the youngest for a bride,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I have bred her at my dearest cost</div>
                              <div class="line">In qualities of the best. This man of thine</div>
                              <div class="line">Attempts her love: I prithee, noble lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Join with me to forbid him her resort;</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself have spoke in vain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">The man is honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore he will be, Timon:</div>
                              <div class="line">His honesty rewards him in itself;</div>
                              <div class="line">It must not bear my daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Does she love him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">She is young and apt:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our own precedent passions do instruct us</div>
                              <div class="line">What levity's in youth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To LUCILIUS</span>           Love you the maid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCILIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord, and she accepts of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">If in her marriage my consent be missing,</div>
                              <div class="line">I call the gods to witness, I will choose</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine heir from forth the beggars of the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dispossess her all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">How shall she be endow'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">if she be mated with an equal husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Three talents on the present; in future, all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">This gentleman of mine hath served me long:</div>
                              <div class="line">To build his fortune I will strain a little,</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'tis a bond in men. Give him thy daughter:</div>
                              <div class="line">What you bestow, in him I'll counterpoise,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make him weigh with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Athenian</div>
                              <div class="line">Most noble lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pawn me to this your honour, she is his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">My hand to thee; mine honour on my promise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCILIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Humbly I thank your lordship: never may</div>
                              <div class="line">The state or fortune fall into my keeping,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is not owed to you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt LUCILIUS and Old Athenian</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">Vouchsafe my labour, and long live your lordship!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you; you shall hear from me anon:</div>
                              <div class="line">Go not away. What have you there, my friend?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">A piece of painting, which I do beseech</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lordship to accept.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Painting is welcome.</div>
                              <div class="line">The painting is almost the natural man;</div>
                              <div class="line">or since dishonour traffics with man's nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">He is but outside: these pencill'd figures are</div>
                              <div class="line">Even such as they give out. I like your work;</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall find I like it: wait attendance</div>
                              <div class="line">Till you hear further from me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods preserve ye!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well fare you, gentleman: give me your hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">We must needs dine together. Sir, your jewel</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath suffer'd under praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Jeweller</div>
                              <div class="line">What, my lord! dispraise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">A more satiety of commendations.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I should pay you for't as 'tis extoll'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">It would unclew me quite.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Jeweller</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, 'tis rated</div>
                              <div class="line">As those which sell would give: but you well know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Things of like value differing in the owners</div>
                              <div class="line">Are prized by their masters: believe't, dear lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">You mend the jewel by the wearing it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well mock'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord; he speaks the common tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which all men speak with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, who comes here: will you be chid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter APEMANTUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Jeweller</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll bear, with your lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll spare none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow to thee, gentle Apemantus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I be gentle, stay thou for thy good morrow;</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou art Timon's dog, and these knaves honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou call them knaves? thou know'st them not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Are they not Athenians?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Then I repent not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Jeweller</div>
                              <div class="line">You know me, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st I do: I call'd thee by thy name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art proud, Apemantus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Of nothing so much as that I am not like Timon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither art going?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To knock out an honest Athenian's brains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a deed thou'lt die for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Right, if doing nothing be death by the law.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">How likest thou this picture, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The best, for the innocence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrought he not well that painted it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He wrought better that made the painter; and yet</div>
                              <div class="line">he's but a filthy piece of work.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Painter</div>
                              <div class="line">You're a dog.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy mother's of my generation: what's she, if I be a dog?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt dine with me, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No; I eat not lords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">An thou shouldst, thou 'ldst anger ladies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, they eat lords; so they come by great bellies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a lascivious apprehension.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So thou apprehendest it: take it for thy labour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">How dost thou like this jewel, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so well as plain-dealing, which will not cost a</div>
                              <div class="line">man a doit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou think 'tis worth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not worth my thinking. How now, poet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, philosopher!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">Art not one?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">Then I lie not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Art not a poet?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Then thou liest: look in thy last work, where thou</div>
                              <div class="line">hast feigned him a worthy fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Poet</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not feigned; he is so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, he is worthy of thee, and to pay thee for thy</div>
                              <div class="line">labour: he that loves to be flattered is worthy o'</div>
                              <div class="line">the flatterer. Heavens, that I were a lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What wouldst do then, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">E'en as Apemantus does now; hate a lord with my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What, thyself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That I had no angry wit to be a lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">Art not thou a merchant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, Apemantus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Traffic confound thee, if the gods will not!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">If traffic do it, the gods do it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Traffic's thy god; and thy god confound thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpet sounds. Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What trumpet's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis Alcibiades, and some twenty horse,</div>
                              <div class="line">All of companionship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, entertain them; give them guide to us.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt some Attendants</p>
                              <div class="line">You must needs dine with me: go not you hence</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I have thank'd you: when dinner's done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Show me this piece. I am joyful of your sights.</div>
                              <p>Enter ALCIBIADES, with the rest</p>
                              <div class="line">Most welcome, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So, so, there!</div>
                              <div class="line">Aches contract and starve your supple joints!</div>
                              <div class="line">That there should be small love 'mongst these</div>
                              <div class="line">sweet knaves,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all this courtesy! The strain of man's bred out</div>
                              <div class="line">Into baboon and monkey.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALCIBIADES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you have saved my longing, and I feed</div>
                              <div class="line">Most hungerly on your sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Right welcome, sir!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere we depart, we'll share a bounteous time</div>
                              <div class="line">In different pleasures. Pray you, let us in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all except APEMANTUS</p>
                        <p>Enter two Lords</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">What time o' day is't, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Time to be honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">That time serves still.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The more accursed thou, that still omitt'st it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art going to Lord Timon's feast?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, to see meat fill knaves and wine heat fools.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare thee well, fare thee well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a fool to bid me farewell twice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Shouldst have kept one to thyself, for I mean to</div>
                              <div class="line">give thee none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang thyself!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I will do nothing at thy bidding: make thy</div>
                              <div class="line">requests to thy friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, unpeaceable dog, or I'll spurn thee hence!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will fly, like a dog, the heels o' the ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">He's opposite to humanity. Come, shall we in,</div>
                              <div class="line">And taste Lord Timon's bounty? he outgoes</div>
                              <div class="line">The very heart of kindness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">He pours it out; Plutus, the god of gold,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is but his steward: no meed, but he repays</div>
                              <div class="line">Sevenfold above itself; no gift to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">But breeds the giver a return exceeding</div>
                              <div class="line">All use of quittance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">The noblest mind he carries</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever govern'd man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Long may he live in fortunes! Shall we in?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll keep you company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A banqueting-room in Timon's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Hautboys playing loud music. A great banquet
served in; FLAVIUS and others attending; then enter
TIMON, ALCIBIADES, Lords, Senators, and VENTIDIUS.
Then comes, dropping, after all, APEMANTUS,
discontentedly, like himself</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VENTIDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Most honour'd Timon,</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath pleased the gods to remember my father's age,</div>
                              <div class="line">And call him to long peace.</div>
                              <div class="line">He is gone happy, and has left me rich:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, as in grateful virtue I am bound</div>
                              <div class="line">To your free heart, I do return those talents,</div>
                              <div class="line">Doubled with thanks and service, from whose help</div>
                              <div class="line">I derived liberty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">O, by no means,</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest Ventidius; you mistake my love:</div>
                              <div class="line">I gave it freely ever; and there's none</div>
                              <div class="line">Can truly say he gives, if he receives:</div>
                              <div class="line">If our betters play at that game, we must not dare</div>
                              <div class="line">To imitate them; faults that are rich are fair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VENTIDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A noble spirit!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, my lords,</div>
                              <p>They all stand ceremoniously looking on TIMON</p>
                              <div class="line">Ceremony was but devised at first</div>
                              <div class="line">To set a gloss on faint deeds, hollow welcomes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Recanting goodness, sorry ere 'tis shown;</div>
                              <div class="line">But where there is true friendship, there needs none.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, sit; more welcome are ye to my fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">Than my fortunes to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They sit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, we always have confess'd it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ho, ho, confess'd it! hang'd it, have you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">O, Apemantus, you are welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No;</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not make me welcome:</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to have thee thrust me out of doors.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, thou'rt a churl; ye've got a humour there</div>
                              <div class="line">Does not become a man: 'tis much to blame.</div>
                              <div class="line">They say, my lords, 'ira furor brevis est;' but yond</div>
                              <div class="line">man is ever angry. Go, let him have a table by</div>
                              <div class="line">himself, for he does neither affect company, nor is</div>
                              <div class="line">he fit for't, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me stay at thine apperil, Timon: I come to</div>
                              <div class="line">observe; I give thee warning on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I take no heed of thee; thou'rt an Athenian,</div>
                              <div class="line">therefore welcome: I myself would have no power;</div>
                              <div class="line">prithee, let my meat make thee silent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I scorn thy meat; 'twould choke me, for I should</div>
                              <div class="line">ne'er flatter thee. O you gods, what a number of</div>
                              <div class="line">men eat Timon, and he sees 'em not! It grieves me</div>
                              <div class="line">to see so many dip their meat in one man's blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">and all the madness is, he cheers them up too.</div>
                              <div class="line">I wonder men dare trust themselves with men:</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks they should invite them without knives;</div>
                              <div class="line">Good for their meat, and safer for their lives.</div>
                              <div class="line">There's much example for't; the fellow that sits</div>
                              <div class="line">next him now, parts bread with him, pledges the</div>
                              <div class="line">breath of him in a divided draught, is the readiest</div>
                              <div class="line">man to kill him: 't has been proved. If I were a</div>
                              <div class="line">huge man, I should fear to drink at meals;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest they should spy my windpipe's dangerous notes:</div>
                              <div class="line">Great men should drink with harness on their throats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, in heart; and let the health go round.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it flow this way, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Flow this way! A brave fellow! he keeps his tides</div>
                              <div class="line">well. Those healths will make thee and thy state</div>
                              <div class="line">look ill, Timon. Here's that which is too weak to</div>
                              <div class="line">be a sinner, honest water, which ne'er left man i' the mire:</div>
                              <div class="line">This and my food are equals; there's no odds:</div>
                              <div class="line">Feasts are too proud to give thanks to the gods.</div>
                              <div class="line">Apemantus' grace.</div>
                              <div class="line">Immortal gods, I crave no pelf;</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray for no man but myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">Grant I may never prove so fond,</div>
                              <div class="line">To trust man on his oath or bond;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or a harlot, for her weeping;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or a dog, that seems a-sleeping:</div>
                              <div class="line">Or a keeper with my freedom;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or my friends, if I should need 'em.</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen. So fall to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Rich men sin, and I eat root.</div>
                              <p>Eats and drinks</p>
                              <div class="line">Much good dich thy good heart, Apemantus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Captain Alcibiades, your heart's in the field now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALCIBIADES</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart is ever at your service, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You had rather be at a breakfast of enemies than a</div>
                              <div class="line">dinner of friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALCIBIADES</div>
                              <div class="line">So the were bleeding-new, my lord, there's no meat</div>
                              <div class="line">like 'em: I could wish my best friend at such a feast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Would all those fatterers were thine enemies then,</div>
                              <div class="line">that then thou mightst kill 'em and bid me to 'em!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Might we but have that happiness, my lord, that you</div>
                              <div class="line">would once use our hearts, whereby we might express</div>
                              <div class="line">some part of our zeals, we should think ourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">for ever perfect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">O, no doubt, my good friends, but the gods</div>
                              <div class="line">themselves have provided that I shall have much help</div>
                              <div class="line">from you: how had you been my friends else? why</div>
                              <div class="line">have you that charitable title from thousands, did</div>
                              <div class="line">not you chiefly belong to my heart? I have told</div>
                              <div class="line">more of you to myself than you can with modesty</div>
                              <div class="line">speak in your own behalf; and thus far I confirm</div>
                              <div class="line">you. O you gods, think I, what need we have any</div>
                              <div class="line">friends, if we should ne'er have need of 'em? they</div>
                              <div class="line">were the most needless creatures living, should we</div>
                              <div class="line">ne'er have use for 'em, and would most resemble</div>
                              <div class="line">sweet instruments hung up in cases that keep their</div>
                              <div class="line">sounds to themselves. Why, I have often wished</div>
                              <div class="line">myself poorer, that I might come nearer to you. We</div>
                              <div class="line">are born to do benefits: and what better or</div>
                              <div class="line">properer can we can our own than the riches of our</div>
                              <div class="line">friends? O, what a precious comfort 'tis, to have</div>
                              <div class="line">so many, like brothers, commanding one another's</div>
                              <div class="line">fortunes! O joy, e'en made away ere 't can be born!</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eyes cannot hold out water, methinks: to</div>
                              <div class="line">forget their faults, I drink to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou weepest to make them drink, Timon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Joy had the like conception in our eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">And at that instant like a babe sprung up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ho, ho! I laugh to think that babe a bastard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">I promise you, my lord, you moved me much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Much!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Tucket, within</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What means that trump?</div>
                              <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">How now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you, my lord, there are certain</div>
                              <div class="line">ladies most desirous of admittance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Ladies! what are their wills?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">There comes with them a forerunner, my lord, which</div>
                              <div class="line">bears that office, to signify their pleasures.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray, let them be admitted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Cupid</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Cupid</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail to thee, worthy Timon, and to all</div>
                              <div class="line">That of his bounties taste! The five best senses</div>
                              <div class="line">Acknowledge thee their patron; and come freely</div>
                              <div class="line">To gratulate thy plenteous bosom: th' ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Taste, touch and smell, pleased from thy tale rise;</div>
                              <div class="line">They only now come but to feast thine eyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">They're welcome all; let 'em have kind admittance:</div>
                              <div class="line">Music, make their welcome!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Cupid</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">You see, my lord, how ample you're beloved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Music. Re-enter Cupid with a mask of Ladies
as Amazons, with lutes in their hands,
dancing and playing</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hoy-day, what a sweep of vanity comes this way!</div>
                              <div class="line">They dance! they are mad women.</div>
                              <div class="line">Like madness is the glory of this life.</div>
                              <div class="line">As this pomp shows to a little oil and root.</div>
                              <div class="line">We make ourselves fools, to disport ourselves;</div>
                              <div class="line">And spend our flatteries, to drink those men</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon whose age we void it up again,</div>
                              <div class="line">With poisonous spite and envy.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who lives that's not depraved or depraves?</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dies, that bears not one spurn to their graves</div>
                              <div class="line">Of their friends' gift?</div>
                              <div class="line">I should fear those that dance before me now</div>
                              <div class="line">Would one day stamp upon me: 't has been done;</div>
                              <div class="line">Men shut their doors against a setting sun.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The Lords rise from table, with much adoring of
TIMON; and to show their loves, each singles out an
Amazon, and all dance, men with women, a lofty
strain or two to the hautboys, and cease</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You have done our pleasures much grace, fair ladies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Set a fair fashion on our entertainment,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was not half so beautiful and kind;</div>
                              <div class="line">You have added worth unto 't and lustre,</div>
                              <div class="line">And entertain'd me with mine own device;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am to thank you for 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lady</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, you take us even at the best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, for the worst is filthy; and would not hold</div>
                              <div class="line">taking, I doubt me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Ladies, there is an idle banquet attends you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you to dispose yourselves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Ladies</div>
                              <div class="line">Most thankfully, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Cupid and Ladies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Flavius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">The little casket bring me hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, my lord. More jewels yet!</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no crossing him in 's humour;</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">Else I should tell him,--well, i' faith I should,</div>
                              <div class="line">When all's spent, he 'ld be cross'd then, an he could.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis pity bounty had not eyes behind,</div>
                              <div class="line">That man might ne'er be wretched for his mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Where be our men?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, my lord, in readiness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Our horses!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter FLAVIUS, with the casket</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">O my friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have one word to say to you: look you, my good lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must entreat you, honour me so much</div>
                              <div class="line">As to advance this jewel; accept it and wear it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Kind my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">I am so far already in your gifts,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">So are we all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, there are certain nobles of the senate</div>
                              <div class="line">Newly alighted, and come to visit you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
