                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">They are fairly welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Vouchsafe me a word; it does concern you near.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Near! why then, another time I'll hear thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, let's be provided to show them</div>
                              <div class="line">entertainment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I scarce know how.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Second Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">May it please your honour, Lord Lucius,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of his free love, hath presented to you</div>
                              <div class="line">Four milk-white horses, trapp'd in silver.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall accept them fairly; let the presents</div>
                              <div class="line">Be worthily entertain'd.</div>
                              <p>Enter a third Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! what news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you, my lord, that honourable</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman, Lord Lucullus, entreats your company</div>
                              <div class="line">to-morrow to hunt with him, and has sent your honour</div>
                              <div class="line">two brace of greyhounds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll hunt with him; and let them be received,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not without fair reward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>                What will this come to?</div>
                              <div class="line">He commands us to provide, and give great gifts,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all out of an empty coffer:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor will he know his purse, or yield me this,</div>
                              <div class="line">To show him what a beggar his heart is,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being of no power to make his wishes good:</div>
                              <div class="line">His promises fly so beyond his state</div>
                              <div class="line">That what he speaks is all in debt; he owes</div>
                              <div class="line">For every word: he is so kind that he now</div>
                              <div class="line">Pays interest for 't; his land's put to their books.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, would I were gently put out of office</div>
                              <div class="line">Before I were forced out!</div>
                              <div class="line">Happier is he that has no friend to feed</div>
                              <div class="line">Than such that do e'en enemies exceed.</div>
                              <div class="line">I bleed inwardly for my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You do yourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">Much wrong, you bate too much of your own merits:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, my lord, a trifle of our love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">With more than common thanks I will receive it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">O, he's the very soul of bounty!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">And now I remember, my lord, you gave</div>
                              <div class="line">Good words the other day of a bay courser</div>
                              <div class="line">I rode on: it is yours, because you liked it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I beseech you, pardon me, my lord, in that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You may take my word, my lord; I know, no man</div>
                              <div class="line">Can justly praise but what he does affect:</div>
                              <div class="line">I weigh my friend's affection with mine own;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell you true. I'll call to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Lords</div>
                              <div class="line">O, none so welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I take all and your several visitations</div>
                              <div class="line">So kind to heart, 'tis not enough to give;</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks, I could deal kingdoms to my friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">And ne'er be weary. Alcibiades,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a soldier, therefore seldom rich;</div>
                              <div class="line">It comes in charity to thee: for all thy living</div>
                              <div class="line">Is 'mongst the dead, and all the lands thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie in a pitch'd field.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALCIBIADES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, defiled land, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">We are so virtuously bound--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">And so</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">So infinitely endear'd--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">All to you. Lights, more lights!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">The best of happiness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Honour and fortunes, keep with you, Lord Timon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Ready for his friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but APEMANTUS and TIMON</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What a coil's here!</div>
                              <div class="line">Serving of becks and jutting-out of bums!</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt whether their legs be worth the sums</div>
                              <div class="line">That are given for 'em. Friendship's full of dregs:</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks, false hearts should never have sound legs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus honest fools lay out their wealth on court'sies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Apemantus, if thou wert not sullen, I would be</div>
                              <div class="line">good to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll nothing: for if I should be bribed too,</div>
                              <div class="line">there would be none left to rail upon thee, and then</div>
                              <div class="line">thou wouldst sin the faster. Thou givest so long,</div>
                              <div class="line">Timon, I fear me thou wilt give away thyself in</div>
                              <div class="line">paper shortly: what need these feasts, pomps and</div>
                              <div class="line">vain-glories?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, an you begin to rail on society once, I am</div>
                              <div class="line">sworn not to give regard to you. Farewell; and come</div>
                              <div class="line">with better music.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wilt not hear me now; thou shalt not then:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll lock thy heaven from thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that men's ears should be</div>
                              <div class="line">To counsel deaf, but not to flattery!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  A Senator's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. A hall in Timon's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A Senator's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Senator, with papers in his hand</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">And late, five thousand: to Varro and to Isidore</div>
                              <div class="line">He owes nine thousand; besides my former sum,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which makes it five and twenty. Still in motion</div>
                              <div class="line">Of raging waste? It cannot hold; it will not.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I want gold, steal but a beggar's dog,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give it Timon, why, the dog coins gold.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I would sell my horse, and buy twenty more</div>
                              <div class="line">Better than he, why, give my horse to Timon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ask nothing, give it him, it foals me, straight,</div>
                              <div class="line">And able horses. No porter at his gate,</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather one that smiles and still invites</div>
                              <div class="line">All that pass by. It cannot hold: no reason</div>
                              <div class="line">Can found his state in safety. Caphis, ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">Caphis, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CAPHIS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir; what is your pleasure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Get on your cloak, and haste you to Lord Timon;</div>
                              <div class="line">Importune him for my moneys; be not ceased</div>
                              <div class="line">With slight denial, nor then silenced when--</div>
                              <div class="line">'Commend me to your master'--and the cap</div>
                              <div class="line">Plays in the right hand, thus: but tell him,</div>
                              <div class="line">My uses cry to me, I must serve my turn</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of mine own; his days and times are past</div>
                              <div class="line">And my reliances on his fracted dates</div>
                              <div class="line">Have smit my credit: I love and honour him,</div>
                              <div class="line">But must not break my back to heal his finger;</div>
                              <div class="line">Immediate are my needs, and my relief</div>
                              <div class="line">Must not be toss'd and turn'd to me in words,</div>
                              <div class="line">But find supply immediate. Get you gone:</div>
                              <div class="line">Put on a most importunate aspect,</div>
                              <div class="line">A visage of demand; for, I do fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">When every feather sticks in his own wing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Timon will be left a naked gull,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which flashes now a phoenix. Get you gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">I go, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">'I go, sir!'--Take the bonds along with you,</div>
                              <div class="line">And have the dates in contempt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. A hall in Timon's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FLAVIUS, with many bills in his hand</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No care, no stop! so senseless of expense,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he will neither know how to maintain it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor cease his flow of riot: takes no account</div>
                              <div class="line">How things go from him, nor resumes no care</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what is to continue: never mind</div>
                              <div class="line">Was to be so unwise, to be so kind.</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall be done? he will not hear, till feel:</div>
                              <div class="line">I must be round with him, now he comes from hunting.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie, fie, fie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CAPHIS, and the Servants of Isidore and Varro</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good even, Varro: what,</div>
                              <div class="line">You come for money?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't not your business too?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is: and yours too, Isidore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Isidore's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">It is so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Would we were all discharged!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes the lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter TIMON, ALCIBIADES, and Lords, &c</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">So soon as dinner's done, we'll forth again,</div>
                              <div class="line">My Alcibiades. With me? what is your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, here is a note of certain dues.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Dues! Whence are you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Athens here, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to my steward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Please it your lordship, he hath put me off</div>
                              <div class="line">To the succession of new days this month:</div>
                              <div class="line">My master is awaked by great occasion</div>
                              <div class="line">To call upon his own, and humbly prays you</div>
                              <div class="line">That with your other noble parts you'll suit</div>
                              <div class="line">In giving him his right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine honest friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, but repair to me next morning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good my lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Contain thyself, good friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">One Varro's servant, my good lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Isidore's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">From Isidore;</div>
                              <div class="line">He humbly prays your speedy payment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">If you did know, my lord, my master's wants--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas due on forfeiture, my lord, six weeks And past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Isidore's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Your steward puts me off, my lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I am sent expressly to your lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me breath.</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you, good my lords, keep on;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll wait upon you instantly.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt ALCIBIADES and Lords</p>
                              <p>To FLAVIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">Come hither: pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">How goes the world, that I am thus encounter'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With clamourous demands of date-broke bonds,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the detention of long-since-due debts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my honour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you, gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">The time is unagreeable to this business:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your importunacy cease till after dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may make his lordship understand</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore you are not paid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so, my friends. See them well entertain'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, draw near.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter APEMANTUS and Fool</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay, stay, here comes the fool with Apemantus:</div>
                              <div class="line">let's ha' some sport with 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, he'll abuse us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Isidore's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">A plague upon him, dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">How dost, fool?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost dialogue with thy shadow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak not to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No,'tis to thyself.</div>
                              <p>To the Fool</p>
                              <div class="line">Come away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Isidore's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">There's the fool hangs on your back already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, thou stand'st single, thou'rt not on him yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CAPHIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's the fool now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He last asked the question. Poor rogues, and</div>
                              <div class="line">usurers' men! bawds between gold and want!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">What are we, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Asses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That you ask me what you are, and do not know</div>
                              <div class="line">yourselves. Speak to 'em, fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you, gentlemen?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Gramercies, good fool: how does your mistress?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">She's e'en setting on water to scald such chickens</div>
                              <div class="line">as you are. Would we could see you at Corinth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good! gramercy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Page</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Look you, here comes my mistress' page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To the Fool</span>  Why, how now, captain! what do you</div>
                              <div class="line">in this wise company? How dost thou, Apemantus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I had a rod in my mouth, that I might answer</div>
                              <div class="line">thee profitably.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, Apemantus, read me the superscription of</div>
                              <div class="line">these letters: I know not which is which.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Canst not read?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There will little learning die then, that day thou</div>
                              <div class="line">art hanged. This is to Lord Timon; this to</div>
                              <div class="line">Alcibiades. Go; thou wast born a bastard, and thou't</div>
                              <div class="line">die a bawd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Page</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wast whelped a dog, and thou shalt famish a</div>
                              <div class="line">dog's death. Answer not; I am gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">E'en so thou outrunnest grace. Fool, I will go with</div>
                              <div class="line">you to Lord Timon's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you leave me there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If Timon stay at home. You three serve three usurers?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; would they served us!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So would I,--as good a trick as ever hangman served thief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you three usurers' men?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">I think no usurer but has a fool to his servant: my</div>
                              <div class="line">mistress is one, and I am her fool. When men come</div>
                              <div class="line">to borrow of your masters, they approach sadly, and</div>
                              <div class="line">go away merry; but they enter my mistress' house</div>
                              <div class="line">merrily, and go away sadly: the reason of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I could render one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do it then, that we may account thee a whoremaster</div>
                              <div class="line">and a knave; which not-withstanding, thou shalt be</div>
                              <div class="line">no less esteemed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">What is a whoremaster, fool?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">A fool in good clothes, and something like thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a spirit: sometime't appears like a lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">sometime like a lawyer; sometime like a philosopher,</div>
                              <div class="line">with two stones moe than's artificial one: he is</div>
                              <div class="line">very often like a knight; and, generally, in all</div>
                              <div class="line">shapes that man goes up and down in from fourscore</div>
                              <div class="line">to thirteen, this spirit walks in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Varro's Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art not altogether a fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor thou altogether a wise man: as much foolery as</div>
                              <div class="line">I have, so much wit thou lackest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That answer might have become Apemantus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Aside, aside; here comes Lord Timon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter TIMON and FLAVIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">APEMANTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come with me, fool, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not always follow lover, elder brother and</div>
                              <div class="line">woman; sometime the philosopher.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt APEMANTUS and Fool</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, walk near: I'll speak with you anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You make me marvel: wherefore ere this time</div>
                              <div class="line">Had you not fully laid my state before me,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I might so have rated my expense,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I had leave of means?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You would not hear me,</div>
                              <div class="line">At many leisures I proposed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to:</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance some single vantages you took.</div>
                              <div class="line">When my indisposition put you back:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that unaptness made your minister,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus to excuse yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O my good lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">At many times I brought in my accounts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Laid them before you; you would throw them off,</div>
                              <div class="line">And say, you found them in mine honesty.</div>
                              <div class="line">When, for some trifling present, you have bid me</div>
                              <div class="line">Return so much, I have shook my head and wept;</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, 'gainst the authority of manners, pray'd you</div>
                              <div class="line">To hold your hand more close: I did endure</div>
                              <div class="line">Not seldom, nor no slight cheques, when I have</div>
                              <div class="line">Prompted you in the ebb of your estate</div>
                              <div class="line">And your great flow of debts. My loved lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though you hear now, too late--yet now's a time--</div>
                              <div class="line">The greatest of your having lacks a half</div>
                              <div class="line">To pay your present debts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Let all my land be sold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis all engaged, some forfeited and gone;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what remains will hardly stop the mouth</div>
                              <div class="line">Of present dues: the future comes apace:</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall defend the interim? and at length</div>
                              <div class="line">How goes our reckoning?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">To Lacedaemon did my land extend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O my good lord, the world is but a word:</div>
                              <div class="line">Were it all yours to give it in a breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">How quickly were it gone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You tell me true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If you suspect my husbandry or falsehood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Call me before the exactest auditors</div>
                              <div class="line">And set me on the proof. So the gods bless me,</div>
                              <div class="line">When all our offices have been oppress'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With riotous feeders, when our vaults have wept</div>
                              <div class="line">With drunken spilth of wine, when every room</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath blazed with lights and bray'd with minstrelsy,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have retired me to a wasteful cock,</div>
                              <div class="line">And set mine eyes at flow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Heavens, have I said, the bounty of this lord!</div>
                              <div class="line">How many prodigal bits have slaves and peasants</div>
                              <div class="line">This night englutted! Who is not Timon's?</div>
                              <div class="line">What heart, head, sword, force, means, but is</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Timon's?</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Timon, noble, worthy, royal Timon!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, when the means are gone that buy this praise,</div>
                              <div class="line">The breath is gone whereof this praise is made:</div>
                              <div class="line">Feast-won, fast-lost; one cloud of winter showers,</div>
                              <div class="line">These flies are couch'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sermon me no further:</div>
                              <div class="line">No villanous bounty yet hath pass'd my heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">Unwisely, not ignobly, have I given.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou weep? Canst thou the conscience lack,</div>
                              <div class="line">To think I shall lack friends? Secure thy heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">If I would broach the vessels of my love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And try the argument of hearts by borrowing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Men and men's fortunes could I frankly use</div>
                              <div class="line">As I can bid thee speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Assurance bless your thoughts!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in some sort, these wants of mine are crown'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I account them blessings; for by these</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I try friends: you shall perceive how you</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistake my fortunes; I am wealthy in my friends.</div>
                              <div class="line">Within there! Flaminius! Servilius!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FLAMINIUS, SERVILIUS, and other Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servants</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord? my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I will dispatch you severally; you to Lord Lucius;</div>
                              <div class="line">to Lord Lucullus you: I hunted with his honour</div>
                              <div class="line">to-day: you, to Sempronius: commend me to their</div>
                              <div class="line">loves, and, I am proud, say, that my occasions have</div>
                              <div class="line">found time to use 'em toward a supply of money: let</div>
                              <div class="line">the request be fifty talents.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">As you have said, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Lord Lucius and Lucullus? hum!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Go you, sir, to the senators--</div>
                              <div class="line">Of whom, even to the state's best health, I have</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserved this hearing--bid 'em send o' the instant</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand talents to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been bold--</div>
                              <div class="line">For that I knew it the most general way--</div>
                              <div class="line">To them to use your signet and your name;</div>
                              <div class="line">But they do shake their heads, and I am here</div>
                              <div class="line">No richer in return.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't true? can't be?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">They answer, in a joint and corporate voice,</div>
                              <div class="line">That now they are at fall, want treasure, cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">Do what they would; are sorry--you are honourable,--</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet they could have wish'd--they know not--</div>
                              <div class="line">Something hath been amiss--a noble nature</div>
                              <div class="line">May catch a wrench--would all were well--'tis pity;--</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, intending other serious matters,</div>
                              <div class="line">After distasteful looks and these hard fractions,</div>
                              <div class="line">With certain half-caps and cold-moving nods</div>
                              <div class="line">They froze me into silence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">You gods, reward them!</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, man, look cheerly. These old fellows</div>
                              <div class="line">Have their ingratitude in them hereditary:</div>
                              <div class="line">Their blood is caked, 'tis cold, it seldom flows;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis lack of kindly warmth they are not kind;</div>
                              <div class="line">And nature, as it grows again toward earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is fashion'd for the journey, dull and heavy.</div>
                              <p>To a Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Go to Ventidius.</div>
                              <p>To FLAVIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, be not sad,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art true and honest; ingeniously I speak.</div>
                              <div class="line">No blame belongs to thee.</div>
                              <p>To Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Ventidius lately</div>
                              <div class="line">Buried his father; by whose death he's stepp'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Into a great estate: when he was poor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Imprison'd and in scarcity of friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">I clear'd him with five talents: greet him from me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid him suppose some good necessity</div>
                              <div class="line">Touches his friend, which craves to be remember'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With those five talents.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <p>To FLAVIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">That had, give't these fellows</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom 'tis instant due. Ne'er speak, or think,</div>
                              <div class="line">That Timon's fortunes 'mong his friends can sink.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAVIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I could not think it: that thought is</div>
                              <div class="line">bounty's foe;</div>
                              <div class="line">Being free itself, it thinks all others so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A room in Lucullus' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A public place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in Sempronius' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  The same. A hall in Timon's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  The same. The senate-house. The Senate sitting.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.7">6. SCENE VI.  The same. A banqueting-room in Timon's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A room in Lucullus' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>FLAMINIUS waiting. Enter a Servant to him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I have told my lord of you; he is coming down to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LUCULLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  One of Lord Timon's men? a gift, I</div>
                              <div class="line">warrant. Why, this hits right; I dreamt of a silver</div>
                              <div class="line">basin and ewer to-night. Flaminius, honest</div>
                              <div class="line">Flaminius; you are very respectively welcome, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fill me some wine.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servants</p>
                              <div class="line">And how does that honourable, complete, free-hearted</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman of Athens, thy very bountiful good lord</div>
                              <div class="line">and master?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">His health is well sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am right glad that his health is well, sir: and</div>
                              <div class="line">what hast thou there under thy cloak, pretty Flaminius?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, nothing but an empty box, sir; which, in my</div>
                              <div class="line">lord's behalf, I come to entreat your honour to</div>
                              <div class="line">supply; who, having great and instant occasion to</div>
                              <div class="line">use fifty talents, hath sent to your lordship to</div>
                              <div class="line">furnish him, nothing doubting your present</div>
                              <div class="line">assistance therein.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">La, la, la, la! 'nothing doubting,' says he? Alas,</div>
                              <div class="line">good lord! a noble gentleman 'tis, if he would not</div>
                              <div class="line">keep so good a house. Many a time and often I ha'</div>
                              <div class="line">dined with him, and told him on't, and come again to</div>
                              <div class="line">supper to him, of purpose to have him spend less,</div>
                              <div class="line">and yet he would embrace no counsel, take no warning</div>
                              <div class="line">by my coming. Every man has his fault, and honesty</div>
                              <div class="line">is his: I ha' told him on't, but I could ne'er get</div>
                              <div class="line">him from't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Servant, with wine</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Please your lordship, here is the wine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Flaminius, I have noted thee always wise. Here's to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lordship speaks your pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have observed thee always for a towardly prompt</div>
                              <div class="line">spirit--give thee thy due--and one that knows what</div>
                              <div class="line">belongs to reason; and canst use the time well, if</div>
                              <div class="line">the time use thee well: good parts in thee.</div>
                              <p>To Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Get you gone, sirrah.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Draw nearer, honest Flaminius. Thy lord's a</div>
                              <div class="line">bountiful gentleman: but thou art wise; and thou</div>
                              <div class="line">knowest well enough, although thou comest to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">that this is no time to lend money, especially upon</div>
                              <div class="line">bare friendship, without security. Here's three</div>
                              <div class="line">solidares for thee: good boy, wink at me, and say</div>
                              <div class="line">thou sawest me not. Fare thee well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible the world should so much differ,</div>
                              <div class="line">And we alive that lived? Fly, damned baseness,</div>
                              <div class="line">To him that worships thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Throwing the money back</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCULLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! now I see thou art a fool, and fit for thy master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FLAMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">May these add to the number that may scald thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let moulten coin be thy damnation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou disease of a friend, and not himself!</div>
                              <div class="line">Has friendship such a faint and milky heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">It turns in less than two nights? O you gods,</div>
                              <div class="line">I feel master's passion! this slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto his honour, has my lord's meat in him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should it thrive and turn to nutriment,</div>
                              <div class="line">When he is turn'd to poison?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, may diseases only work upon't!</div>
